welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Letchworth, a charming city known as the 'Garden City' of England. We hope you enjoy exploring our quaint streets, stunning gardens, and rich history. Have a wonderful time discovering all that Letchworth has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Stansted Airport, primarily used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 4-hour time limit per session.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport handles all commercial flights and provides a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering exclusive services and facilities for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cambridge Airport handles all commercial flights and passenger services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Royal Air Force Alconbury Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
